certification.title: Certification
certification.text1: Modern cybersecurity standards require professionals not only to have knowledge but also to have official proof of their qualifications. Certification is not just a document but a real demonstration of competence in the field of data and system protection.
certification.CISSP_description: Certification for professionals involved in developing and managing information security.
certification.CEH_description: Training specialists for testing systems for vulnerabilities and addressing them.
certification.CompTIA_Security_description: Basic certification covering key aspects of cybersecurity.
certification.CISM_description: Certification for professionals managing security processes in organizations.
certification.interactive_sessions: Interactive sessions on real threats: The training uses practical examples simulating modern cyber-attacks.
certification.adapted_courses: Courses adapted to your industry: Programs take into account the specifics of your company’s work to make the training as useful as possible.
certification.course_updates: Course updates considering new threats: Our courses are constantly refined according to the latest trends in cybersecurity.

phishing.title: Phishing Simulations
phishing.description: Phishing remains one of the most common threats: about 90% of attacks on companies start with fake emails or messages. Simply informing employees is not enough — it is necessary to regularly check their vigilance in real conditions.
phishing.services_title: We offer phishing simulations that mimic real attacks to achieve the following:
phishing.realistic_emails_description: We develop phishing attacks that match modern social engineering methods.
phishing.employee_reactions_description: We evaluate which employees are vulnerable, who clicked on suspicious links or provided confidential information.
phishing.weakness_identification_description: We identify departments and employees who need additional training.
phishing.personalized_feedback_description: After testing, we provide individual recommendations and educational materials.
phishing.outcome: This practice significantly reduces the likelihood of successful attacks, increases employee awareness, and helps avoid financial losses.

mobile.title: Mobile Device Protection
mobile.description: In today’s environment, mobile devices are not only communication tools but also potential entry points for attackers. Unsecured smartphones and tablets can lead to the leakage of confidential information, compromised credentials, and the penetration of malicious software into the corporate network.
mobile.services_title: We offer comprehensive mobile device protection measures, including:
mobile.training: Training employees in mobile security basics:
mobile.training_description: Practical sessions on protecting personal and corporate devices from attacks.
mobile.policies_description: Development and implementation of recommendations for using mobile devices in a corporate environment.
mobile.access_control_description: Implementation of multi-factor authentication (MFA) and device management (MDM) solutions.
mobile.app_security_description: Evaluation of the mobile apps used for vulnerabilities and potential threats.
mobile.risks_reduction: We help not only protect mobile devices but also minimize risks associated with data leaks and malware.
